title: Indicia of escrow depository prohibited
context: [ยง449-1.7] Indicia of escrow depository prohibited. Unless licensed under this chapter to engage in the business of an escrow depository, no person may use the word &ldquo;escrow&rdquo; or words of similar import, or translations of those words, as a facetious or fanciful name, or in a manner that might suggest or tend to lead others into believing that the person is an escrow depository. [L 1992, c 205, pt of ยง1]
